verbose_text: ([our translation], Comment on the article " There has been Napoleon the Small, Now, There is Macky the Small " (our translation), Guinee7, 26 September 2014) It is notable that within these comments blaming immigrants, significant hatred was expressed (n = 81, 8.48%), such as " How long before the illegals and/or homosexual males bring this disgusting disease to the America.
